question: India has co-sponsored an UNSC resolution on “participation of women in peacekeeping operations”, put forth by which country?
explanation:
In a United Nations Security Council resolution put forth by Indonesia, India has co-sponsored for full, effective and meaningful participation of women personnel in peacekeeping operations.
India is one of the largest contributors of troop to UN peacekeeping missions. In June 2020, India was elected non-permanent member of UN Security Council for a term of 2 years beginning January 1, 2021.
